title: THOUGHT / WHAT LIES BENEATH
description: Broke into Cuno's parents' room and communist apartment and Gary's apartment and church â€“ counter. Global thought after 2.

dialogueTree.title: Savoir Faire: "Master Investigator! You just can't..."
dialogueTree.text: Master Investigator! You just can't keep yourself away from locked and hidden places, can you?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Nothing. Nothing! You're right -- g..."
links.text: Nothing. Nothing! You're right -- get in there... deep. Invade every personal space, break every lock...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Yes, that's what it is... a quick p..."
links.text: Yes, that's what it is... a quick peek here, a short glance there. It is all quite... delectable.

links.title: You: "It is my duty as a cop to investiga..."
links.text: It is my duty as a cop to investigate every square inch of this world.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Attaboy! The world's secrets were m..."
links.text: Attaboy! The world's secrets were made for you. They wait patiently for you to uncover them...

links.title: You: "Hey! I am not some sort of a... pee..."
links.text: Hey! I am not some sort of a... peeper.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Sure, friend. This is nothing sordi..."
links.text: Sure, friend. This is nothing sordid, nothing inappropriate. You just *have* to do this... it's your duty.
